title: Geno Smith Isn’t the Only Reason the Seahawks Are Riding a Mile High
description: A new offensive system, a resurgent quarterback, and a stellar draft class have the Seahawks soaring in the N.F.C. West.
dc:creator: Mike Tanier
media:description: Geno Smith, 32, is thriving as the Seahawks’ starting quarterback: He leads the league in completion percentage (72.7) and is tied for fifth with 13 passing touchdowns.
